verses.text: And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,

Son of man , prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy , and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts , Hear ye the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;\f + \fr 13.2 \ft that prophesy out…: Heb. that are prophets out of their own hearts\f*

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Woe unto the foolish prophets , that follow their own spirit , and have seen nothing!\f + \fr 13.3 \ft follow: Heb. walk after\f*\f + \fr 13.3 \ft and…: or, and things which they have not seen\f*
O Israel , thy prophets are like the foxes in the deserts.

Ye have not gone up into the gaps , neither made up the hedge for the house of Israel to stand in the battle in the day of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 13.5 \ft gaps: or, breaches\f*\f + \fr 13.5 \ft made…: Heb. hedged the hedge\f*

They have seen vanity and lying divination , saying , The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* saith : and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not sent them: and they have made \add others\add* to hope that they would confirm the word.
Have ye not seen a vain vision , and have ye not spoken a lying divination , whereas ye say , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* saith \add it;\add* albeit I have not spoken ?

Therefore thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Because ye have spoken vanity , and seen lies , therefore, behold, I \add am\add* against you, saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.

And mine hand shall be upon the prophets that see vanity , and that divine lies : they shall not be in the assembly of my people , neither shall they be written in the writing of the house of Israel , neither shall they enter into the land of Israel ; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 13.9 \ft assembly: or, secret, or, counsel\f* \p

¶ Because, even because they have seduced my people , saying , Peace ; and \add there was\add* no peace ; and one built up a wall , and, lo , others daubed it with untempered \add morter:\add*\f + \fr 13.10 \ft a wall: or, a slight wall\f*

Say unto them which daub \add it\add* with untempered \add morter\add*, that it shall fall : there shall be an overflowing shower ; and ye , O great hailstones , shall fall ; and a stormy wind shall rend \add it\add*.
Lo, when the wall is fallen , shall it not be said unto you, Where \add is\add* the daubing wherewith ye have daubed \add it\add*?

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will even rend \add it\add* with a stormy wind in my fury ; and there shall be an overflowing shower in mine anger , and great hailstones in \add my\add* fury to consume \add it\add*.

So will I break down the wall that ye have daubed with untempered \add morter\add*, and bring it down to the ground , so that the foundation thereof shall be discovered , and it shall fall , and ye shall be consumed in the midst thereof: and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus will I accomplish my wrath upon the wall , and upon them that have daubed it with untempered \add morter\add*, and will say unto you, The wall \add is\add* no \add more\add*, neither they that daubed it;

\add To wit\add*, the prophets of Israel which prophesy concerning Jerusalem , and which see visions of peace for her, and \add there is\add* no peace , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ Likewise, thou son of man , set thy face against the daughters of thy people , which prophesy out of their own heart ; and prophesy thou against them,

And say , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Woe to the \add women\add* that sew pillows to all armholes , and make kerchiefs upon the head of every stature to hunt souls ! Will ye hunt the souls of my people , and will ye save the souls alive \add that come\add* unto you?\f + \fr 13.18 \ft armholes: or, elbows\f*

And will ye pollute me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread , to slay the souls that should not die , and to save the souls alive that should not live , by your lying to my people that hear \add your\add* lies ?

Wherefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against your pillows , wherewith ye there hunt the souls to make \add them\add* fly , and I will tear them from your arms , and will let the souls go , \add even\add* the souls that ye hunt to make \add them\add* fly.\f + \fr 13.20 \ft to make…: or, into gardens\f*

Your kerchiefs also will I tear , and deliver my people out of your hand , and they shall be no more in your hand to be hunted ; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because with lies ye have made the heart of the righteous sad , whom I have not made sad ; and strengthened the hands of the wicked , that he should not return from his wicked way , by promising him life :\f + \fr 13.22 \ft by…: or, that I should save his life: Heb. by quickening him\f*
Therefore ye shall see no more vanity , nor divine divinations : for I will deliver my people out of your hand : and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
